description: As a passionate and experienced Web Designing Teacher, I take great pride in inspiring and empowering the next generation of creative minds. With a deep understanding of modern web design principles and technologies, I strive to cultivate a dynamic and engaging learning environment for my students.

As an avid enthusiast of travel and technology, my journey into the world of Ticket Booking has been nothing short of exhilarating. As a Ticket Booker, I have had the privilege of being a part of the seamless process that connects travelers with their dream destinations.
Experienced Scopper (Biometric Officer) adept in advanced identification technology. Committed to data security, accuracy, and privacy. Empowering organizations with seamless biometric solutions.

Experienced Web Developer at Obrang & Brightpoint, adept in crafting innovative digital solutions. Collaborated within dynamic teams to create visually appealing websites that elevated user experiences. Committed to excellence, problem-solving, and impactful project delivery.

Full-Stack Programmer at Shenaas Company, specializing in developing websites and MIS. Skilled in delivering innovative digital solutions while collaborating with designers to create visually engaging and functional platforms.
